sentences.en: A hooligan persecuted her with telephone calls.
sentences.cn: 小流氓不停地用电话跟她纠缠.

sentences.en: He grabbed the hooligan and shot him out of the door.
sentences.cn: 他一把抓住歹徒,把他扔出门外.

sentences.en: He is the hooligan of this alley, do not offend him.
sentences.cn: 他是这条巷子里出了名的青皮, 你可别惹他.

sentences.en: He was really handsome, what a handsome hooligan he was.
sentences.cn: 他真的很帅, 这个小流氓真是帅呆了.

sentences.en: His notoriety as a hooligan did not come until his death.
sentences.cn: 他作为流氓的恶名是在死后才传开的.

sentences.en: I am a football supporter and I have to often explain that I'm not one of the hooligan sort because we'll all get tarred with the same brush when there's trouble.
sentences.cn: 我是足球迷，经常要解释我不是那种足球流氓，因为一旦出事，我们就会被当成是一路货色。

sentences.en: Not punishing these hooligan amounts to condoning their behavior.
sentences.cn: 不惩处这些无赖就意味着宽恕他们的行为.

sentences.en: That damn Li Yang a hooligan.
sentences.cn: 那个讨厌的李阳是个无赖.

sentences.en: That hooligan liked ripping off when he could.
sentences.cn: 那个阿飞喜欢偷窃,只要一有机会他就动手.

sentences.en: The hooligan was striking off all the flower heads with his stick.
sentences.cn: 这小流氓正在用棍子打掉所有的花朵.

sentences.en: The severe punishment was meted out to the unruly hooligan.
sentences.cn: 对那个嚣张的流氓已给予严厉惩处.

sentences.en: The young hooligan is a fool for women.
Thought short and thin, Jimmy walked into the stout hooligan.
sentences.cn: 虽然又矮又瘦, 吉米却勇敢地冲向那粗壮的恶徒.

sentences.en: What other types of trouble do you think Hooligan gets involved in?
sentences.cn: 您猜胡立根还制造了什么麻烦呀?

sentences.en: You are really a hooligan to do such a thing.
sentences.cn: 能办出这种事来,你真是个泼皮!

trans.tran_en: a noisy violent person who causes trouble by fighting etc
